Submodules

eigenvectorcontinuation.methods module

Includes methods helpful to running and plotting the EVC process

Plotting tools Multiple target points are used to produce a simple plot. Details

may vary depending on implementation specifics

eigenvectorcontinuation.methods.plot_xxz_spectrum(bzmin, bzmax, evec_cont: EigenvectorContinuer)

plots the spectrum of eigenvalues for a given EVC

Parameters

  • bzmin – the minimum b_z value to plot

  • bzmax – the maximum b_z value to plot

  • evec_cont – the EVC to plot (plots training/target points and expected energies)
